column3: The more people who are vaccinated the more we protect all parts of the population
column4: Those treatments have no known benefit and there is no way to predict how serious your reaction to being infected could be, including death
column5: By vaccinating the masses we dramatically reduce the likelihood of anyone getting seriously Ill or dying
column6: there is no evidence of long term issues with the vaccine
column7: The number of clots was in the 10s amongst millions of administered doses, far less risk than being unvaccinated.
column8: The technology behind the vaccine is known to fe safe for pregnant women and the far greater danger is to be unvaccinated and catch covid when pregnant
column9: This was to allow the fast track development of the vaccine, which we required to short circuit the normal testing timescale, not because there is any concerns.
column10: Any trials are done under the strictest safety procedures as are used in all trials
column11: Testing has been exhaustive and no issues amongst billions of administered doses
column12: The vaccine is based in long known technology with an excellent history of safety
column13: Vaccines are for the greater good, we all help each other stay safe.
column14: The J&J vaccine is fully compliant with all ethics regulations

column3: What scientific evidence is this based on?  This seems like a generalisation and when these are made they generally over simplify and misrepresent the facts.  Please provide your sources.
column4: I would be careful taking a natural approach and then taking non-natural substances which might not be proven or recommended by health experts.
column5: Prevention is always better than treatment or cure.
column6: Glad they official areas monitoring this for public safety - system is working, gives me confidence. Need to wait for outcomes before jumping to conclusions.
column7: Seems suspension based on availability of other vaccines which have lower risk in blood clots.  Sensible move.
column8: There is no way to prove 100% of any fact, there is always a chance of finding an adverse result in future.  Need to balance low risk of birth defect with risk of having COVID while pregnant.
column9: Every product has protection against legal action, even McDonalds has indemnities. It would be naive to think otherwise.
column10: Are they only testing on children?  What lead up studies have been done to get approval for testing on children?  They are not testing experimental medicine on children first.
column11: mrna vaccines are not in their infancy, this tech has been used for many years.  The intention of the trial is to study some long term effects and ongoing monitoring.
column12: This is just not based on fact, and there are risks with everything we do everyday and you need to balance the different risk you are willing to accept.  These drugs have been through rigorous testing and the long term affects of most drugs cannot be known without long term data.
column13: How is this a sin?  It is not an immoral action to enhance public safety.  This is unhelpful.
column14: Are the catholic church leaders medical experts?  I would defer to expertise of medical and scientific experts before I follow lead of religious experts commenting outside their area of knowledge.
column15: I thought it was really interesting.  I find it hard to look for sources to reference counter-arguments as these types of issues are very controversial.
